description:
The Patriotic Knight Corps (PKC) was a vigilante/terrorist organisation that "purged" any citizens that they deemed to be "treasonous". In reality, they were a private army owing allegiance to http://anidb.net/ch743 [Truniht] and his cronies such as http://anidb.net/ch762 [Togliatti], acting to intimidate, assault and even murder their political opponents.
It is revealed later that there are deep connections between the Terraists and the PKC.
name: Yuukoku Kishidan
